name: Olukai Nohea Mesh Slip On - Men's
description: They feel as though you're not really even wearing shoes. The slip-on design (or pull-on, depending on the energy you choose to exert) has enough tread to grip your longboard deck. The contoured footbed adds comfort for paved days. Mesh upper keeps the air flowing and the wearing cool.Synthetic mesh upper with hand-sewn whipstich details create a clean look.Dri-Lex moisture wicking cover.Elastic gore panels provide plenty of stretch ensure a snug fit.Removable EverFit footbed is anatomically contoured to add support.Drop-in heel feature lets you slip on and off with ease.Outsoles are all-weather, non-marking rubber with heavy gauge sidewall stitching for durability.
